biotools.summary: SProCoP is a set of statistical process control aids for visualize, detect, and identify of assignable causes of variation in chromatographic performance (e.g., retention time reproducibility, peak asymmetry, and resolution); and mass spectrometric performance (targeted peptide ion intensity and mass measurement accuracy for high resolving power instruments) via control charts and boxplots.
